ygData.subject: Re: Rubicite replacement armor
ygData.msgSnippet: heres the info i have.  In kithicore forest is the rangers/druid quest.  I know the rangers is ivy etched, and the druid im guessing. The temple of solosek ro,
ygData.messageBody:
heres the info i have. In kithicore forest is the rangers/druid quest. I know the rangers is ivy etched, and the druid im guessing.
The temple of solosek ro, is through lava storm. Inside there is the three spellcasters and bards
i know the enchanters have wand, mask, and gloves. The magician has robes and some other stuff. OTHER! equipment is available there. As well as a few clerical items. If anyone wants to go through and start naming who gives what and how. I have taken screen shots of what the enchanter person has said. But other then what he said thats it.

Nefertina
-----Original Message-----
From: Avron Elselynn <avron@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>; eqpaladin@onelist.com <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 5:25 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Rubicite replacement armor


I would like to hear reports of any and all armor that replaces rubicite, stats, where quests start etc..

Oh and does anyone know what level you need to be to go to the new zone Temple of Solusek Ro?

- Avron -
